pages.text: quraish ke svabhaav banaane ke kaaran
unake jaade tatha garmee kee yaatra ka svabhaav banaane ke kaaran
unhen chaahiye ki is ghar (kaaba) ke prabhu kee pooja karen
jisane unhen bhookh mein khilaaya tatha dar se nidar kar diya
(he nabee!) kya tumane use dekha, jo pratikaar (badale) ke din ko jhuthalaata hai
yahee vah hai, jo anaath (yateem) ko dhakka deta hai
aur gareeb ko bhojan dene par nahin ubhaarata
vinaash hai un namaaziyon ke lie
jo apanee namaaz se achet hain
aur jo dikhaave (aadambar) ke lie karate hain
tatha maoon (prayog mein aane vaalee maamoolee cheez) bhee maangane se nahin dete
(he nabee!) hamane tumhen kausar pradaan kiya hai
to tum apane paalanahaar ke lie namaaz padho tatha bali do
nihsandeh tumhaara shatru hee be naam nishaan hai
